https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xdBexpFqrBf4bHEO8bLi2X3cH9V.jpg Andrea is a receptionist and loves soap opera star Sam Lloyd Pascual. When Sam Lloyd Pascual checks in to the resort hotel she works in, he invites her for a romantic dinner. She now has a chance to make fantasy love a reality but this turns out tragically. Bad Romance
